The ID3 Project | Graded Homework 1
--> Project Designed in R Language
--> The Submitted folder includes R Script "classfier.R"
--> This Script is an interactive script, whihc takes user input as the "dataset file & partition file"
--> Run this Script using RStudio IDE
--> Place the Dataset & partition files in the working directory of the R Project
--> Use Console to run the script
--> Refer to "consoleInput.txt" for sample input

Files Description
--> "consoleInput.txt" : Sample Input to the Program
--> "result.txt" : Sample Output generated by the Program Script
--> "classifier.R" : R Script containing the program
--> "Sample_Datasets" : The format of Dataset compatible with the code

R Libraries required to be pre-installed:
-->data.tree
-->stringr 

References:
https://www.r-project.org/about.html
https://cran.r-project.org/mirrors.html
https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/data.tree/vignettes/data.tree.html
https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/stringr/vignettes/stringr.html
https://www.rstudio.com
